const ShelfMain=({shelf,listBook,handleupdate})=>{ //shelf page each shelf will be display with the map method using it in ListOfBook file //filtering the book to replace each one in his shelf //select option return(

{shelf.name}

    {listBook .filter( (b) => b.shelf.replace(/ +/g, "").toLowerCase() === shelf.name.replace(/ +/g, "").toLowerCase() ) .map((book) => (
  1. {book.title}
    {book.authors}
    2. ))}
) } export default ShelfMain;
